verses.verse: Give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh!<WH3068> Call<WH7121> on his name!<WH8034> Make his doings<WH5949> known<WH3045> among the peoples.<WH5971>
Sing<WH7891> to him,<WH2167> sing praises to him!<WH7878> Tell of all his marvelous works.<WH6381>
Glory<WH1984> in his holy<WH6944> name.<WH8034> Let the heart<WH3820> of those who seek<WH1245> Yahweh<WH3068> rejoice.<WH8055>
Seek<WH1875> Yahweh<WH3068> and his strength.<WH5797> Seek<WH1245> his face<WH6440> forever more.<WH8548>
Remember<WH2142> his marvelous works<WH6381> that he has done;<WH6213> his wonders,<WH4159> and the judgments<WH4941> of his mouth,<WH6310>
you seed<WH2233> of Abraham,<WH85> his servant,<WH5650> you children<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> his chosen ones.<WH972>
He is Yahweh,<WH3068> our God.<WH430> His judgments<WH4941> are in all the earth.<WH776>
He has remembered<WH2142> his covenant<WH1285> forever,<WH5769> the word<WH1697> which he commanded<WH6680> to a thousand<WH505> generations,<WH1755>
the covenant which he made<WH3772> with Abraham,<WH85> his oath<WH7621> to Isaac,<WH3446>
and confirmed<WH5975> the same to Jacob<WH3290> for a statute;<WH2706> to Israel<WH3478> for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant,<WH1285>
saying,<WH559> "To you I will give<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> the lot<WH2256> of your inheritance;<WH5159>"
when they were but a few men<WH4962> in number,<WH4557> yes,<WH4592> very few, and foreigners in it.<WH1481>
They went<WH1980> about from nation<WH1471> to nation,<WH4467> from one kingdom to another<WH312> people.<WH5971>
He allowed<WH3240> no one<WH120> to do them wrong.<WH6231> Yes,<WH3198> he reproved kings for their sakes,<WH4428>
"Don't<WH5060> touch my anointed<WH4899> ones!<WH5030> Do my prophets no harm!<WH7489>"
He called<WH7121> for a famine<WH7458> on the land.<WH776> He destroyed<WH7665> the food<WH3899> supplies.<WH4294>
He sent<WH7971> a man<WH376> before<WH6440> them.<WH3130> Joseph was sold<WH4376> for a slave.<WH5650>
They bruised<WH6031> his feet<WH7272> with shackles.<WH3525> His<WH5315> neck was locked<WH935> in irons,<WH1270>
until the time<WH6256> that his word<WH1697> happened,<WH935> and Yahweh<WH3068>'s word<WH565> proved him true.<WH6884>
The king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> and freed<WH5425> him;<WH4910> even the ruler of peoples,<WH5971> and let him go free.<WH6605>
He made<WH7760> him lord<WH113> of his house,<WH1004> and ruler<WH4910> of all of his possessions;<WH7075>
to discipline<WH631> his princes<WH8269> at his pleasure,<WH5315> and to teach his elders<WH2205> wisdom.<WH2449>
Israel<WH3478> also came<WH935> into Egypt.<WH4714> Jacob<WH3290> lived<WH1481> in the land<WH776> of Ham.<WH2526>
He increased<WH6509> his people<WH5971> greatly,<WH3966> and made them stronger<WH6105> than their adversaries.<WH6862>
He turned<WH2015> their heart<WH3820> to hate<WH8130> his people,<WH5971> to conspire<WH5230> against his servants.<WH5650>
He sent<WH7971> Moses,<WH4872> his servant,<WH5650> and Aaron,<WH175> whom he had chosen.<WH977>
They performed<WH7760> miracles<WH226> among them,<WH4159> and wonders in the land<WH776> of Ham.<WH2526>
He sent<WH7971> darkness,<WH2822> and made it dark.<WH2821> They didn't<WH4784> rebel against his words.<WH1697>
He turned<WH2015> their waters<WH4325> into blood,<WH1818> and killed<WH4191> their fish.<WH1710>
Their land<WH776> swarmed<WH8317> with<WH8317> frogs,<WH6854> even in the rooms<WH2315> of their kings.<WH4428>
He spoke,<WH559> and swarms of flies<WH6157> came,<WH935> and lice<WH3654> in all their borders.<WH1366>
He gave<WH5414> them hail<WH1259> for rain,<WH1653> with<WH3852> lightning<WH784> in their land.<WH776>
He struck<WH5221> their vines<WH1612> and also their fig trees,<WH8384> and shattered<WH7665> the trees<WH6086> of their country.<WH1366>
He spoke,<WH559> and the locusts<WH697> came,<WH935> and the grasshoppers,<WH3218> without number,<WH4557>
ate up<WH398> every plant<WH6212> in their land;<WH776> and ate<WH398> up the fruit<WH6529> of their ground.<WH776>
He struck<WH5221> also all the firstborn<WH1060> in their land,<WH776> the first<WH7225> fruits of all their manhood.<WH202>
He brought them forth<WH3318> with silver<WH3701> and gold.<WH2091> There was not one feeble<WH3782> person among his tribes.<WH7626>
Egypt<WH4714> was glad<WH8055> when they departed,<WH3318> for the fear<WH6343> of them had fallen on them.<WH5307>
He spread<WH6566> a cloud<WH6051> for a covering,<WH4539> fire<WH784> to give light<WH215> in the night.<WH3915>
They asked,<WH7592> and he brought<WH935> quails,<WH7958> and satisfied<WH7646> them with the bread<WH3899> of the sky.<WH8064>
He opened<WH6605> the rock,<WH6697> and waters<WH4325> gushed out.<WH2100> They ran<WH1980> as a river<WH5104> in the dry places.<WH6723>
For he remembered<WH2142> his holy<WH6944> word,<WH1697> and Abraham,<WH85> his servant.<WH5650>
He brought forth<WH3318> his people<WH5971> with joy,<WH8342> his chosen<WH972> with singing.<WH7440>
He gave<WH5414> them the lands<WH776> of the nations.<WH1471> They took the labor<WH5999> of the peoples<WH3816> in possession,<WH3423>
that they might keep<WH8104> his statutes,<WH2706> and observe<WH8104> his laws.<WH8451> Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050>
